term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - partial decay constant in nuclear chemistry
term.title: partial decay constant

item.text: For a radionuclide: the probability in unit time for the decay of one of its nuclei by one of several modes of decay.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1547 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
